Name: Destiny Island
About the game: Destiny Island - is a meditative walking simulator where you play a man who visits his memories in a elevator. You can walk, talk and try to understand events that got you here. Have a conversation with the ghosts of your past Reflect on the questions of the life and religion Listen to the music growning with you Find a meaning of your life Conversations are based on the 'The Seven Deadly Sins and the Four Last Things', painting attributed to Hieronymus Bosch.
Meta Title: Destiny Island: Jan 30, 2021, Empty Essence and Full Over...
Meta Description: Looking for information on Destiny Island? Check out the release date (Jan 30, 2021), developer insights from Empty Essence, and a complete game summary.
